Brandon Library

Manager: Mathew Sheldrick

Bury Road, Brandon
IP27 0BQ

  • Tel: 01842 773390
  • Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk
  • Friends group: Friends of Brandon Library
  • Facebook

Room & venue hire

Room and space hire at Brandon Library →

Opening hours

Day Hours
Monday Closed
Tuesday 1000 – 1730
Wednesday 1000 – 1500
Thursday 1000 – 1730
Friday 1000 – 1800
Saturday 1000 – 1300, 1400 – 1700
Sunday 1000 – 1500

Branch facilities

  • Accessibility information
  • Payments: cash, cheques and cards accepted
  • Parking: free car park available adjacent to the library
  • Customer toilet
  • Display space: Space for A3, A4 and A5 posters advertising local events
  • Which? available - ask staff for magazine or to log in

IT and printing facilities

  • Free wifi
  • Book a computer
  • Photocopying: available
  • Colour printing: available
  • Scan to email
  • Printing, photocopying & scanning charges

Regular events and activities

Children’s events

Baby Bounce and Tot Rock

Monday, 0935-1000

Songs and rhymes for babies and toddlers.

Find out more about Wordplay

Book time

Tuesday, 1530-1555

Stories and rhymes for pre-school children (term time only).

Find out more about Wordplay

Craft activities: for primary school age children

first and third Sunday of the month, 1115-1230

Lego and construction club: for 4-11 year-olds

Sunday every four weeks: upcoming dates 16 February, 15 March, 19 April (no session 12 April due to Easter), 10 May, 7 June, 5 July, 1100-1300

A different theme each session, work individually or in groups. Under 7s must be accompanied by an adult.

Tot Rock

Thursday, 0935-1000

Songs and action rhymes for toddlers.

Find out more about Wordplay

Older people’s events

Brandon Circle coffee morning: for over 50s

third Monday of the month., 1030-1200

Reading groups

The Newbies book group

first Thursday of the month, 1400-1600

The Original book group

third Thursday of the month, 1400-1600

Writing groups

Creative writing workshops

second Monday of the month, 1000

Contact the library for more information.

Poetry group

first Monday of the month, 1030

Contact the library for more information.
